description: Amendments to planning permission dated 8th May 2025 (RN 25/00945/FULL) for the Internal and external refurbishment to facilitate the reversion to and use for a single dwellinghouse, comprising: installation of a new dormer window to front elevation; installation of a dormer window to the west elevation at third floor; replacement of windows throughout; removal of non-original external fire escape staircase to rear facade and installation of a balcony to the rear facade a ground and first floor level and a new external staircase to access the garden from lower ground level; rationalising the rear facade (removal of exposed cabling, replacement of rainwater goods); installation of a lift within the original closet wing with lift overrun; removal of non-original partitions and openings, addition of new partitions, and infill of redundant openings throughout; creation of new opening within existing fabric at ground floor and replacement with doors; repairs, enhancements and redecoration throughout including to fireplaces and doors; removal of non-permeable hard surfaces in front and rear gardens and addition of new planting and terraces; pruning of the existing trees to the front of the property; and other relevant alterations. NAMELY, for the removal of condition 10.
